mapper.select:
select *
from dt_prod_plan dtp join prod_plan p on dtp.prod_plan_code = p.prod_plan_code join prdt_table pt on dtp.prdt_code = pt.prdt_code order by p.prod_plan_date DESC
select o.order_code , o.order_date , o.dod_date , o.dod_state , o.order_manager, b.bp_code , b.bp_name from orders o join business_partner b on o.bp_code = b.bp_code where o.prod_plan_yn = 'n'
mapper.insert:
select 'PPN' || LPAD(prod_plan_seq.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') as prodPlanCode from dual
{call in_prod_up_order( #{orderCode}, #{prodPlanCode}, #{prodPlanName}, NVL(#{prodPlanDate},sysdate), #{prodName}, #{prodPlanSdate}, #{prodPlanEdate}, #{result , mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string} )}
mapper.select:
select * from dt_prod_plan dtp join prod_plan p on dtp.prod_plan_code = p.prod_plan_code join prdt_table pt on dtp.prdt_code = pt.prdt_code
p.prod_name like '%' || #{prodName} || '%'
or p.prod_plan_name like '%' || #{prodPlanName} || '%'
order by prod_plan_date desc
select prod_plan_code, prod_plan_name, prod_name, prod_plan_date, order_code from prod_plan where prod_inst_yn = 'n' order by prod_plan_date desc
select prod_inst_name ,prod_plan_code ,prod_inst_code ,prod_inst_manager ,prod_inst_date ,prod_inst_sdate ,prod_inst_edate from prod_inst where prcs_start_yn = 'n' order by prod_inst_date desc

SELECT dtp.dt_prod_plan_code, dtp.prod_plan_cnt, dtp.prod_rank, dtp.prod_plan_note , p.prod_plan_code , p.prod_plan_name, p.prod_name, p.prod_plan_date, p.prod_plan_sdate, p.prod_plan_edate , pt.prdt_name , pt.prdt_code
, nvl(dto.order_dt_cnt, 0) order_dt_cnt
FROM dt_prod_plan dtp JOIN prod_plan p ON dtp.prod_plan_code = p.prod_plan_code JOIN prdt_table pt ON dtp.prdt_code = pt.prdt_code
LEFT OUTER JOIN dt_order dto ON p.order_code = dto.order_code AND dtp.prdt_code = dto.prdt_code
WHERE p.prod_plan_code = #{prodPlanCode}
mapper.update: update prod_plan set prod_plan_name = #{prodPlanName}, prod_name = #{prodName}, prod_plan_date = #{prodPlanDate}, prod_plan_sdate = #{prodPlanSdate}, prod_plan_edate = #{prodPlanEdate} where prod_plan_code = #{prodPlanCode}
mapper.select: select p.prod_plan_name, prdt.prdt_name ,dtp.prod_plan_cnt, p.prod_plan_code, prdt.prdt_code from prod_plan p join dt_prod_plan dtp on p.prod_plan_code = dtp.prod_plan_code join prdt_table prdt on dtp.prdt_code = prdt.prdt_code where p.prod_plan_code = #{prodPlanCode}

SELECT prdt_code, mtl_code, get_mtl_name(mtl_code) mtl_name, SUM(mtl_cnt) mtl_need FROM bom_detail JOIN bom_table USING(bom_code) JOIN dt_prod_plan USING(prdt_code) JOIN prod_plan USING(prod_plan_code) WHERE prod_plan_code = #{prodPlanCode} AND mtl_cnt is not null GROUP BY prdt_code, mtl_code ORDER BY prdt_code

select p.prod_plan_name, prdt.prdt_name, dtp.prod_plan_cnt, p.prod_plan_code, prdt.prdt_code, dpi.prod_inst_cnt, dpi.prod_inst_yn, dpi.prod_inst_rank, dtp.prod_plan_cnt - dpi.prod_inst_cnt as prod_inst_incomp_cnt, pi.prod_inst_name, pi.prod_inst_manager, pi.prod_inst_date, pi.prod_inst_sdate, pi.prod_inst_edate, pi.prod_inst_code, dpi.dt_prod_inst_code from prod_plan p join dt_prod_plan dtp on p.prod_plan_code = dtp.prod_plan_code join prdt_table prdt on dtp.prdt_code = prdt.prdt_code join prod_inst pi on pi.prod_plan_code = p.prod_plan_code join dt_prod_inst dpi on pi.prod_inst_code = dpi.prod_inst_code and dpi.prdt_code = dtp.prdt_code where pi.prod_plan_code = #{prodPlanCode} and dpi.prod_inst_yn = 'n'
mapper.insert:
select 'PID' || LPAD(dt_prod_inst_seq.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') as dtProdInstCode from dual
insert into dt_prod_inst (dt_prod_inst_code, prod_inst_rank, prod_inst_cnt, prod_inst_code, prdt_code) values( #{dtProdInstCode}, #{prodInstRank}, #{prodInstCnt}, #{prodInstCode}, #{prdtCode} )
mapper.update: update prod_inst set prod_inst_name = #{prodInstName}, prod_inst_manager = #{prodInstManager}, prod_inst_date = #{prodInstDate}, prod_inst_sdate = #{prodInstSdate}, prod_inst_edate = #{prodInstEdate} where prod_inst_code = #{prodInstCode}
mapper.select:
select p.prod_inst_code , d.dt_prod_inst_code , p.prod_plan_code , p.prod_inst_name , d.prdt_code , pt.prdt_name, d.prod_inst_cnt , d.prod_inst_rank , d.prod_inst_yn , p.prod_inst_edate , p.prod_inst_sdate , p.prod_inst_manager from dt_prod_inst d join prod_inst p on d.prod_inst_code = p.prod_inst_code join prdt_table pt on d.prdt_code = pt.prdt_code
p.prod_inst_name like '%' || #{prodInstName} || '%'
or p.prod_inst_manager like '%' || #{prodInstManager} || '%'
order by p.prod_inst_code desc

select p.prcs_code , d.dt_prod_inst_code , d.prdt_code , pt.prdt_name , p.prcs_order , p.prdt_total , pi.prod_inst_edate , p.prdt_prod_cnt from dt_prod_inst d join process p on d.dt_prod_inst_code = p.dt_prod_inst_code join prod_inst pi on pi.prod_inst_code = d.prod_inst_code join prdt_table pt on pt.prdt_code = d.prdt_code where p.prdt_total != p.prdt_prod_cnt

select p.prcs_code , d.dt_prod_inst_code , d.prdt_code , pt.prdt_name , p.prcs_order , p.prdt_total , GET_PRDT_SUM(#{prcsCode}) prdtProdSum from dt_prod_inst d join process p on d.dt_prod_inst_code = p.dt_prod_inst_code join prod_inst pi on pi.prod_inst_code = d.prod_inst_code join prdt_table pt on pt.prdt_code = d.prdt_code where p.prcs_code = #{prcsCode}

SELECT prod_inst_code , prod_inst_name , process_result.prdt_code , prcs_std_code , get_prcs_name(prcs_std_code) prcs_name , manager , prcs_sdate , prcs_edate , prdt_cnt , err_cnt , pass_cnt FROM process_result JOIN process USING(prcs_code) JOIN dt_prod_inst USING(dt_prod_inst_code) JOIN prod_inst USING(prod_inst_code)
